android.car.cluster

类 ClusterActivityState

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.cluster.ClusterActivityState

  • public final class ClusterActivityState
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that represents activity state in the cluster and can be serialized / deserialized to/from bundle.

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Returns true if the cluster is currently able to display content, or false if the content area of the cluster is hidden.

      • getUnobscuredBounds

        public Rect getUnobscuredBounds()
        Get a rectangle inside the cluster content area that is not covered by any decorations. Activities designed to display content in the instrument cluster can use this information to determine where to display user-relevant content, while using the rest of the window for content bleeding. For example, a navigation activity could decide to display current road inside this rectangle, while drawing additional map background outside this area.

        All values of this Rect represent absolute coordinates inside the activity canvas.

      • getExtras

        public Bundle getExtras()
        Get any custom extras that were set on this activity state.

      • setVisible

        public ClusterActivityState setVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets whether the cluster is currently able to display content, or false if content area of the cluster is hidden.
        返回:
        this instance for chaining.

      • setUnobscuredBounds

        public ClusterActivityState setUnobscuredBounds(Rect unobscuredBounds)
        Sets a rectangle inside that cluster content area that is not covered by any decorations. Activities designed to display content in the cluster can use this to determine where to display user-relevant content, while using the rest of the window for content bleeding.
        参数:
        unobscuredBounds - a Rect describing the area inside the activity canvas that is not covered by any decorations. All values of this Rect represent absolute coordinates inside the activity canvas.
        返回:
        this instance for chaining.

      • setExtras

        public ClusterActivityState setExtras(Bundle bundle)
        Set any custom extras to be included with the activity state.
        返回:
        this instance for chaining.

      • create

        public static ClusterActivityState create(boolean visible,
                                          Rect unobscuredBounds)
        Creates a ClusterActivityState with the given visibility and unobscured bounds (see setVisible(boolean) and setUnobscuredBounds(Rect) for more details)

      • fromBundle

        public static ClusterActivityState fromBundle(Bundle bundle)
        Reconstructs a ClusterActivityState from a Bundle

      • toBundle

        public Bundle toBundle()
        Returns a Bundle representation of this instance. This bundle can then be deserialized using fromBundle(Bundle).

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
